title: 28. Is Daylight Saving Time Hazardous to Your Health?
description: Changing the clocks has been linked to car accidents and heart attacks. This week, Bapu Jena sheds some light on the damage we might be doing by springing forward and falling back.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Changing the clocks has been linked to car accidents and heart attacks. This week, Bapu Jena sheds some light on the damage we might be doing by springing forward and falling back.
